<cs> i am very grateful to the noble and learned lord for taking the trouble to give a preliminary explanation of the clauses <e> <s> it is unfortunate and certainly not his fault that he did not begin until three minutes past ten <e> <s> that means that the report of the debates in your lordships committee will not be in print until thursday morning <e>

<cs> that is not enough for me <e> <s> if the position is not improved by which i mean if the provision does not disappear on report i shall have to divide the house <e> <s> the correct route for barefoot pleaders who qualify in england is through the front door of clause the greatly enhanced and improved clause which we look forward to reading in the fullness of time <e>

<cs> i might say that it was a person who is qualified to practise in certain courts and certain categories of proceedings under clause of the law reform miscellaneous provisions scotland act <e> <s> however for brevity i have used the term which derives from north american experience about which i spoke on second reading <e>
<cs> i beg leave to withdraw the amendment <e>
